attributes.action: Ban all Argentinain athletes from entering the UK to take part in the 2012 Olympics
attributes.additional_details:
The Argentinan government has proved that it is incapable of acting in a mature and reasonable way.  They have already used the 2012 Olympic preperations for one publicity stunt and as such should all Argentinian athletes and politicians should be barred from attending the 2012 Olympics in order to prevent more attention seeking publicity stunts.

The Falklands Islands are part of the UK.
